text: Robert "Bob" Lynn Carroll (May 5, 1938 – April 8, 2020) was an American–Canadian vertebrate paleontologist. His works focused on Paleozoic and Mesozoic amphibians and reptiles. He was born in Kalamazoo, Michigan. Carroll died on April 8, 2020 in Westmount, Quebec from COVID-19, aged 81. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Canada Category:American paleontologists Category:Canadian biologists Category:Educators from Michigan Category:Academics of McGill University Category:Scientists from Michigan Category:Writers from Michigan Category:Writers from Quebec Category:People from Kalamazoo, Michigan
title: Robert L. Carroll
